title: BRIEF-Canadian Food Inspection Agency Says Various Raw Beef And Raw Veal Products Recalled Due To E. Coli O157H7
text:
BRIEF-Canadian Food Inspection Agency Says Various Raw Beef And Raw Veal Products Recalled Due To E. Coli O157H7

Economy 3 hours ago (Oct 05, 2019 04:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Canadian Food Inspection Agency Says Various Raw Beef And Raw Veal Products Recalled Due To E. Coli O157H7 Oct 5 (Reuters) - Canadian Food Inspection Agency: * VARIOUS RAW BEEF AND RAW VEAL PRODUCTS RECALLED DUE TO E. COLI O157:H7 * IS VERIFYING THAT INDUSTRY IS REMOVING RECALLED PRODUCTS FROM MARKETPLACE * THERE HAVE BEEN NO REPORTED ILLNESSES ASSOCIATED WITH CONSUMPTION OF THESE PRODUCTS

BRIEF-Canadian Food Inspection Agency Says Various Raw Beef And Raw Veal Products Recalled Due To E. Coli O157H7
